DEMO_203_MSG_020: ́Wait a minute... is that a human? Could it be... ȁ!?
DEMO_203_MSG_030: ́I've been keeping a close on you through Ace! Our Reactors are all linked together!
DEMO_203_MSG_040:
́The name's Chomach! I'm all about speed, hatin' anything that moves at a snail's pace!
ā
DEMO_203_MSG_050: ́I came here in search of a legendary program, said to be installed on a Reactor left behind here by the Resistance.
DEMO_203_MSG_060:
́Except that greedy Bundold already got his hands on it! 
Look like even I was late on this one...
ā
DEMO_203_MSG_070:
́Now, ȁ... I'm guessin' you came here to defeat Bundold, isn't that right?
ā
DEMO_203_MSG_080: ́How's about you defeat Bundold, retrieve that Reactor, and I'll show you the secret data installed on that device!?Ă
DEMO_203_MSG_090:
́Great! I knew I could count on you! We just met, and this friendship's already off to a great start!
ā
DEMO_203_MSG_100: ́Alright-alright, first thing's first, take a look at this stone statue. It's a key mechanism to navigatin' through this garden!
DEMO_203_MSG_110:
́That stone statue... it can be pivoted. I saw some beefier monsters spinning it around earlier!
ā
DEMO_203_MSG_120:
́Now, then! Start solvin' that puzzle, and let's bring down ol' Bundold while gettin' that Reactor back in the process!
ā
DEMO_203_MSG_085: ́Oh, come now! It's not like you've got any other choice if you're gonna beat him up anways. So, how's about it?!Ă
DEMO_203_MSG_125:
́Watch out for monsters while you're tryin' to 
solve the puzzle!
DEMO_203_MSG_113:
́Makin' the stone statue face the proper direction apparently opens up a secret door.
ā
